titles.title: Establishing the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2025 and setting forth the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2026 through 2034.
Establishing the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2025 and setting forth the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2026 through 2034.

action.text: The House Committee on the Budget reported an original measure, H. Rept. 119-4, by Mr. Arrington.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 1.
